techmeme.title: A profile of Tornado Cash co-founder Roman Storm, set to go on trial on July 14 for conspiracy to commit money laundering; Storm says most users were legitimate (Alexander Osipovich/Wall Street Journal)
Apple says the AirPods Max will get 24-bit, 48 kHz lossless audio, including Personalized Spatial Audio, and ultra‑low latency in April via a software update (Chris Welch/The Verge)
CB Insights: Q1 2025 has had 11 startup sales worth $1B+ so far, totaling a record $54.5B, up from two acquisitions worth $1B+ in Q1 2024, totaling $3.2B (Katie Roof/Bloomberg)
A survey of 730 developers: 75% have tried AI, 35.6% are AI optimists, 38.4% are AI pessimists, freelancers use AI more, 50%+ of employers pay for AI, and more (Wired)
Google confirms Google Maps had "a technical issue that caused the deletion of Timeline data for some people", but says those with backups can restore the data (Hadlee Simons/Android Authority)
